definition: surname Ren/Ren County 任縣|任县[Ren2 Xian4] in Hebei

to assign/to appoint/to take up a post/office/responsibility/to let/to allow/to give free rein to/no matter (how, what etc)/classifier for terms served in office, or for spouses, girlfriends etc (as in 前任男友)

(main) hall/large room for a specific purpose/CL:間|间[jian1]/relationship between cousins etc on the paternal side of a family/of the same clan/classifier for classes, lectures etc/classifier for sets of furniture

sentences.english: Properties and the original Nintendo console in the front.
sentences.chinese: 任天堂原控制器的特点在前面。

sentences.english: Not all of Nintendo's rivals have shared its suffering.
sentences.chinese: 任天堂的竞争对手并非都有它的遭遇。

sentences.english: My first job at Nintendo was repairing consumers' NES decks.
sentences.chinese: 我在任天堂的第一份工作是修理顾客的NES面板。

sentences.english: Nintendo and Sony. This is a call out to you.
sentences.chinese: 任天堂和索尼，这是对你们的一个召唤。

sentences.english: Nintendo showed off a few trailers of 3-D movies such as How To Train Your Dragon on the 3DS.
sentences.chinese: 任天堂展示了《驯龙高手》等几部3D影片的预告片。

sentences.english: The gaming system is Microsoft’s attempt to one-up Nintendo’s Wii.
sentences.chinese: 微软试图以此游戏击败任天堂的Wii。

sentences.english: Nintendo, meanwhile, believes in fewer brands of toothpaste.
sentences.chinese: 然而任天堂坚信少数品牌的牙膏。

sentences.english: Nintendo Controller Nylon Velcro Wallet has been duly authorized.
sentences.chinese: 任天堂正式授权控制器尼龙粘扣带钱包。

sentences.english: I remember back in the days how all the kids were crazy about Nintendo.
sentences.chinese: 我还记得以前每个小孩都在疯任天堂的时代。

sentences.english: It lets you play Nintendo 8-bits games on your mobile.
sentences.chinese: 可以让你在手机上玩任天堂的8位游戏。

sentences.english: Why Nintendo can top "the world's best companies" list?
sentences.chinese: 为什么任天堂能排名“全球最佳企业”榜首？

sentences.english: CD: Yeah, to do something like the Nintendo Channel on DSi.
sentences.chinese: 恩，在DSi上做一些类似任天堂频道的事。

sentences.english: Even so, Nintendo has been thinking about phones for at least a decade.
sentences.chinese: 即使如此，在至少十年内任天堂都一直考虑到手机业。

sentences.english: Understand that I've played videogames my entire life starting with Atari & Nintendo right up till just a few months ago.
sentences.chinese: 要知道，我从雅达利和任天堂远祖时代玩到几个月前。

sentences.english: In reality, Nintendo managed to sell 900, 000 in the first week.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，任天堂在第一周就卖出了90万份。

definition: Zelda (in Legend of Zelda video game)
main engine/(military) lead aircraft/(computing) host computer/main processor/server
tax levied on a conquered people by an army/fee for a divination session/variant of 氪金[ke4 jin1], in-app purchase (gaming)

pinyin: jue2 se4 ban4 yan3 you2 xi4
